title: Wichita Tries To Boost Its Aviation Industry With Smaller Planes
teaser: It's a great time to be in the aviation industry, unless you are in Wichita, Kansas. Wichita calls itself the Air Capitol, what Detroit is to automobiles. But just like Detroit, Wichita has hit hard times.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
